check_box.label: Show Hover Tips
check_box.name: ShowHoverTips
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to show hover tips on avatars and some other things - set this one first (CTRL+SHIFT+T)

check_box.label: on All Objects
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to show hover tips on in-world objects
check_box.name: ShowAllHoverTips

check_box.label: on Land
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to show hover tips on land
check_box.name: ShowLandHoverTips
FSShowGroupTitleInTooltip
check_box.label: Show avatar group titles in hovertips

slider.label: Tooltips:
slider.name: ToolTipDelay_slider
slider.tool_tip: Delay after that tooltips for user interface elements such as buttons are shown. (Default: 0.7)

slider.label: Avatars:
slider.name: AvatarInspectorTooltipDelay_slider
slider.tool_tip: Delay after that hovertips for avatars are shown. (Default: 0.35)

slider.label: Objects:
slider.name: ObjectInspectorTooltipDelay_slider
slider.tool_tip: Delay after that hovertips for objects are shown. (Default: 0.35)

slider.label: Floating text fade distance (in m):
slider.tool_tip: Sets the distance where floating text (hovertext) starts to fade
slider.name: FSHudTextFadeDistance

slider.label: Floating text fade range (in m):
slider.tool_tip: Sets the range it takes for a floating text (hovertext) to fade from fully visible to completely invisible
slider.name: FSHudTextFadeRange

check_box.name: FSHudTextUseHoverHighlight
check_box.label: Hover over object to highlight floating text:
check_box.tool_tip: When an object is being hovered over, highlight the floating text (hovertext) by moving the text to the foreground and disable its alpha

combo_box.name: FSHudTextShowBackgroundDropdown
combo_box.tool_tip: Displays a black/white background behind the floating text (hovertext) to make it more readable. The opacity can be changed under Colors > Miscellaneous

combo_box.name: ScriptDialogsPositionDropdown
combo_box.tool_tip: Choose where script dialogs (menus) come up on your screen.

check_box.label: Animate Script Dialogs
check_box.name: FSAnimatedScriptDialogs
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to make script dialogs animate when opening (Classic V1.x behavior). Only works when dialogs open from the top down.

slider.label: Visible rows per script dialog:
slider.name: FSRowsPerScriptDialog
slider.tool_tip: The maximum number of rows in a script dialog that will be visible at the same time.

check_box.label: Use Pie Menu
check_box.name: UsePieMenu
check_box.tool_tip: Use the classic V1 ring menu instead of rectangular context menus when right clicking on land, avatars, objects or attachments.

check_box.label: Enable text animation
check_box.name: PieMenuPopupFontEffect
check_box.tool_tip: Enables the text within the pie menu being part of the animation when the pie menu opens.

check_box.label: Enable outer ring shade
check_box.name: PieMenuOuterRingShade
check_box.tool_tip: Enables an additional outer ring shade that helps visualizing sub menus.

radio_group.name: ShowGroupNoticesTopRight
radio_group.tool_tip: Choose where group notifications and chiclet icons will appear on the screen.

check_box.label: Hide group and IM chat chiclets
check_box.name: FSDisableIMChiclets
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, Firestorm will not show any group / IM chat chiclets (notifications envelope and sum of IMs will remain on the screen).

check_box.label: Use legacy list layout for Notifications window
check_box.name: FSLegacyNotificationWell
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, Firestorm will use the legacy list view to display stored notifications.

check_box.label: Auto-resize Conversations and legacy Notifications lists
check_box.name: FSLegacyNotificationWellAutoResize
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, Firestorm will always resize the Conversations and legacy Notifications lists automatically when items get added or removed.

check_box.label: Remap shortcuts already used by Linux (Linux only; requires restart)
check_box.name: FSRemapLinuxShortcuts
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, shortcuts that are already used by the Linux operating system (such as CTRL-ALT-Fx) will be remapped.

check_box.label: Prevent statistics window from gaining focus
check_box.name: FSStatisticsNoFocus
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the statistics window will never receive focus when another window is closed (actions such as changing graph layout for items are still possible when enabled).

check_box.label: Show thumbnails of inventory items in tooltips
check_box.name: FSShowInventoryThumbnailTooltips
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, hovering over inventory items containing a thumbnail will show the thumbnail in a tooltip.

slider.label: Thumbnail tooltip delay:
slider.tool_tip: The delay for tooltips showing thumbnails of inventory item
slider.name: FSInventoryThumbnailTooltipsDelay

slider.label: Number of times IM tabs flash:
slider.name: ButtonsFlashCount

slider.label: IM tab flash period:
slider.tool_tip: Time in seconds a single flash of IM tabs takes - used for IM notifications
slider.name: ButtonFlashRate

check_box.tool_tip: Show traffic indicator in top menu
check_box.label: Show traffic indicator in upper right corner of the screen
check_box.name: ShowNetStats

check_box.label: Use legacy period mean per second display for traffic indicator
check_box.name: FSStatbarLegacyMeanPerSec
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, Firestorm will use the legacy method of showing the period mean per second value in the traffic indicator instead of the current observed value

check_box.label: Clicking on traffic indicator opens Statistics instead of the Lag Meter
check_box.name: FSUseStatsInsteadOfLagMeter

check_box.label: Show media controls in top menu
check_box.name: FSEnableVolumeControls
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, Firestorm will show media controls (volume, media, stream) in upper right corner of the screen. Useful, if skin already has its own controls.

check_box.label: Show simulator version in top menu
check_box.name: FSStatusbarShowSimulatorVersion
check_box.tool_tip: Shows the current simulator version in the V1-like status bar.

check_box.label: Enable mouse rollover popup on status bar menu icons
check_box.name: FSStatusBarMenuButtonPopupOnRollover

combo_box.name: FSStatusBarTimeFormat
combo_box.tool_tip: Selects the time format used on main menu bar.

check_box.label: Open avatar profile directly when clicking on its name
check_box.name: FSInspectAvatarSlurlOpensProfile
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, Firestorm will open the profile of an avatar directly when clicking on a link with its name

check_box.label: Disable automatic opening of block list
check_box.name: FSDisableBlockListAutoOpen
check_box.tool_tip: Disables the automatic opening of the block list when blocking avatars or objects.

check_box.label: 'Friends' and 'Groups' in 'Comm' menu opens the [SHORT_VIEWER_GENERATION] based windows
check_box.name: FSUseV2Friends
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, Friends / Groups will open through the People panel - otherwise they will open in the Contacts panel.

check_box.label: Use legacy object properties
check_box.name: FSUseLegacyObjectProperties
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the legacy object profile window will be used when opening object properties.

check_box.label: Use small camera window
check_box.name: FSUseSmallCameraFloater
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the smaller, legacy camera window without camera preset controls will be used.

check_box.name: FSUseStandaloneGroupFloater
check_box.label: Group profiles
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, group profiles will open in separate windows.

check_box.name: FSUseStandaloneTeleportHistoryFloater
check_box.label: Teleport history
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, using the shortcut for teleport history will open the history in a separate window.

check_box.name: FSUseStandaloneBlocklistFloater
check_box.label: Block/mute list
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the list of blocked/muted residents and objects will open in a separate window.

check_box.name: FSUseStandalonePlaceDetailsFloater
check_box.label: Landmarks, place details and teleport history details
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, landmarks, place details and teleport history details will open in separate windows.

check_box.name: FSTeleportHistoryShowPosition
check_box.label: Position
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the local coordinates within the region will be shown in the teleport history.

check_box.name: FSTeleportHistoryShowDate
check_box.label: Date
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the date and time of the teleport will be shown in the teleport history.

check_box.label: Username
check_box.name: FSFriendListColumnShowUserName
check_box.tool_tip: The contact list will show a column with the friend's username.

check_box.label: Display name
check_box.name: FSFriendListColumnShowDisplayName
check_box.tool_tip: The contact list will show a column with the friend's display name.

check_box.label: Full name
check_box.name: FSFriendListColumnShowFullName
check_box.tool_tip: The contact list will show a column with the friend's full name.

check_box.label: Show permissions column
check_box.name: FSFriendListColumnShowPermissions
check_box.tool_tip: The contact list will show the columns with the permissions you granted this avatar and vice versa.

check_box.label: Show search filter
check_box.name: FSContactListShowSearch
check_box.tool_tip: The contact list will show a search textbox to filter the list.

check_box.label: Hide empty system folders from inventory
check_box.name: DebugHideEmptySystemFolders
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the inventory windows will hide all empty system folders like Favorites, Landmarks etc.

check_box.label: Show the Received Items folder in normal inventory
check_box.name: FSShowInboxFolder
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the inventory windows will also show the Received Items folder

check_box.label: Always show Received Items button at bottom of inventory
check_box.name: FSAlwaysShowInboxButton
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the Received Items button is always shown at the bottom of the inventory windows, even if the folder is shown in the inventory.

check_box.label: Allow separate search terms on each tab in inventory
check_box.name: FSSplitInventorySearchOverTabs
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, it is possible to enter a different search term for each tab in inventory.

slider.label: Space between lowest Toast and bottom:
slider.tool_tip: Space in pixels between the bottom of the UI and the bottom toast
slider.name: ToastSpace

slider.label: Notification Toast life:
slider.tool_tip: Number of seconds that a notification toast is displayed before fading
slider.name: ToastLifetime

slider.label: Tip Toast life:
slider.tool_tip: Number of seconds that a tip toast is displayed before fading
slider.name: TipToastLifetime

slider.label: Nearby Chat Toast life:
slider.tool_tip: Number of seconds that a nearby chat popup is displayed before fading
slider.name: NearbyToastLifetime

slider.label: Nearby Chat Toast z-offset:
slider.tool_tip: Controls the z-offset of nearby chat toasts
slider.name: FSNearbyChatToastsOffset

slider.label: Nearby Chat Toast fade time:
slider.tool_tip: Number of seconds that a nearby chat popup takes to fade completely
slider.name: NearbyToastFadingTime

slider.label: Startup Toast life:
slider.tool_tip: Number of seconds that a toast is shown on startup before fading
slider.name: StartupToastLifetime

slider.label: Normal Toast fade time:
slider.tool_tip: Number of seconds that a normal toast is displayed before fading
slider.name: ToastFadingTime

slider.label: Gap between Toasts:
slider.tool_tip: Gap between adjacent toasts in pixels
slider.name: ToastGap

slider.label: Height of Overflow Toast:
slider.tool_tip: Height of an overflow toast in pixels
slider.name: OverflowToastHeight

slider.label: Width of Nearby Chat Toast:
slider.tool_tip: Width of a the nearby chat popups in percent of screen width
slider.name: NearbyToastWidth

check_box.label: Show toasts in front of other windows
check_box.name: FSShowToastsInFront

check_box.label: Don't shake my screen when region restart alert message is shown
check_box.name: FSNoScreenShakeOnRegionRestart

check_box.label: Send region restart info to channel:
check_box.name: FSReportRegionRestartToChat

panel.label: Font
panel.name: UI-font-tab
panel.text: pt (requires restart) Default 0. Larger values may not work well.

combo_box.name: FSNotecardFontName
combo_box.tool_tip: Name of the font used in the notecard editor

combo_box.name: FSNotecardFontSize
combo_box.tool_tip: Size of the font used in the notecard editor

panel.text: Emoji Font Settings: (restart required for full effect)
